pr_title: Do not allow publish interval configurability for telemetry and FSS less than default.

timeline.message: Do not allow publish interval configurability for telemetry and FSS less than default. Remove publish topic configurability.
Fix accesibility for test feartures interface and methods.
Get test features override for FSS and telemetry.
Get test features override for FSS and telemetry.
Get test features override for FSS and telemetry.
Get test features override for FSS and telemetry.
Get test features override for FSS and telemetry.
Get test features override for FSS and telemetry.

timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: why is all this stuff public now? Keep things private or package-private.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: if you're pulling the intvalue, why are you using Double? Why not just Integer?
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText:
cause when I am sending the config in the UAT like
            | aws.greengrass.TestFeatureParameters | LATEST | telemetryPeriodicAggregateMetricsIntervalSec  | 3 |

The value is 3.0 So it is a double/float.
replies.author: nikkhilmuthye

replies.bodyText: That's a bug with how our SDK is using GSON
replies.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to log here? Also if the current value is larger than DEFAULT_PERIODIC_UPDATE_INTERVAL_SEC, should we reduce it to DEFAULT_PERIODIC_UPDATE_INTERVAL_SEC?
timeline.author: hui-yang

replies.bodyText: I don't think we should change the value if the new value is lesser than the default and current value is greater than. default.
replies.author: nikkhilmuthye
